product_details.name: Dove Dandruff Care Shampoo for Dry, Itchy & Flaky Scalp, 650 ml
product_details.description: Scared of going out with white scalp flakes over your shoulder? When white flakes appear, all we want to know is how to prevent dandruff – and quickly. Say 'bye' to dandruff and dryness with the Dove Dandruff Care Shampoo. The ZPTO formula is clinically proven to target dandruff at its source. This shampoo removes dandruff* from your scalp without causing harm to your hair. Clinically tested, the formula enriched with ZPTO is proven to be successful at removing dandruff without leaving your hair dry & rough. ZPTO formula starts to clear visible flakes from the first wash. This gentle shampoo effectively relieves dandruff associated itches and clears up white flakes with regular use. The unique formula nourishes from roots up, combining beautiful hair results with effective dandruff relief*, for hair you can be proud of in no time. This anti-dandruff shampoo nourishes your hair from root up, combining beautiful hair results with effective dandruff relief*. Step out of the shower to soft, smooth and visibly flake- free strands*: quick results, with nourishing care, too. For best results, use Dove Dandruff Care shampoo along with Dove Dandruff Care conditioner together. *No visible flakes with regular product use, effect may vary with person.

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold, professional layout designed to highlight an anti-dandruff shampoo product. It employs a dual-tone background: a rich blue gradient on the left, transitioning into a soft white and light blue gradient on the right, divided by dynamic yellow angled lines. The layout includes a large, eye-catching product image on the right side. The text is divided into five primary layers: two bold headings (`heading_1`, `heading_2`) in white, a subheading (`subheading`) in golden yellow, a checklist-style features list (`description`) in white, and a prominent price tag (`price`) in white just above a call-to-action button (`cta_background`, `cta`) in golden yellow and blue respectively. The overall style is clean and modern, leveraging contrast and visual hierarchy.

**Color Palette:**
- Blue Gradient: `#005DA8` to `#0079C1`
- Accent Yellow: `#F8D568`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Light Gradient Blue: `#E6F2F9`
- CTA Text Blue: `#005DA8`
product_color: The product image features a clean, professional color palette emphasizing trust, freshness, and clinical efficacy. Key colors include **white (#FFFFFF)** as the dominant background for a clean and hygienic look, and **deep blue (#003399)** used for the Dove logo and text to signify reliability and depth. **Gold/yellow (#D6A73F)** adds a touch of sophistication and highlights the "Micro Moisture Serum" and "Clinically Proven" sections. The **gray (#696969)** pump adds neutrality and balances the design. Soft gradients of **light blue (#A7D3F4)** in the splash element evoke freshness and moisture. All colors are smoothly integrated, with contrasting hues used for emphasis.
